function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Household waste containing COVID-19 infection due to home isolation or mild symptoms","Impact":"Risk of spreading infection to waste handlers or others in the household","Mitigation":"Implement special waste management strategies such as disinfection or storage for 72 hours","Technologies":"Disinfection methods, waste storage systems","People":"People in home isolation or with mild symptoms, waste handlers","Owner":"Health authorities, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Increased amount of household waste due to global lockdowns","Impact":"Risk of increased environmental pollution and strain on waste management systems","Mitigation":"Reduce single-use items, promote recycling and waste reduction initiatives","Technologies":"Recycling technologies, waste reduction campaigns","People":"General public, waste management companies","Owner":"Environmental agencies, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Access to alternative water sources for water consumption","Impact":"Risk of water scarcity and dependency on traditional sources","Mitigation":"Develop and promote the use of alternative water sources and efficient water usage practices","Technologies":"Water harvesting systems, water-efficient appliances","People":"Communities, water consumers","Owner":"Water management authorities, government agencies"}]}
